about.name: Ranjith Varatharajan
about.title: Application Development Specialist / Agentic AI Developer
about.summary: Seasoned Agentic AI Developer & Front-End Specialist with a 11-year track record. Specializing in crafting intelligent, autonomous web applications using Angular (v2-21) and LLM orchestration. Experienced in applying SOLID principles and TDD to ensure robust, maintainable code. Committed to professional growth through the seamless integration of Agentic AI technologies into diverse work environments.

experience.title: Application Development Specialist
experience.description: Leading the frontend modernization initiative for WPD/CMA MUT applications, rewriting legacy UI screens into a responsive Angular architecture. Mentoring junior developers (ASEs) in Angular best practices and ensuring high-quality, timely delivery. Collaborating directly with client support teams to troubleshoot complex production issues and deploy rapid fixes, significantly reducing downtime.

experience.title: Technical Lead
experience.description: Spearheaded the development of engineering solutions using ASP.NET Web Forms, MVC, and Angular. Acted as a key technical liaison for the Engineering Solutions Team, resolving critical client escalations and ensuring prompt delivery of patches. Architected robust frontend components and optimized SQL Server queries to improve application performance.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Played a pivotal role in the full-stack development lifecycle, delivering high-impact features for global clients. Worked closely with the Client Support department to analyze root causes of recurring issues and implemented systemic fixes, enhancing system stability and user satisfaction.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Optimized and maintained a high-traffic e-commerce application, implementing critical bug fixes and feature enhancements. Initiated a large-scale data mining project to extract actionable insights from legacy data. Leveraged SSIS/SSRS to generate comprehensive reports, driving data-driven decision-making for stakeholders.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Drove the digital transformation of manual hotel administration processes into efficient web applications. Built custom hotel/room reservation workflows and policy engines. Interfaced directly with clients to gather requirements, document custom policies, and provide on-site training and support, ensuring successful product adoption.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Contributed to the development of core software modules, consistently meeting tight deadlines without compromising quality. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver large-scale projects, focusing on code maintainability and adherence to software design standards.

projects.title: Terminal Resume
projects.description: A cyberpunk-inspired, interactive command-line interface (CLI) resume. Features a cinematic boot sequence, idle protocol (Matrix screensaver), and a theme engine.

projects.title: Retro Scientific Orrery
projects.description: A mathematically accurate solar system simulator. Calculates planetary positions using Keplerian Orbital Elements and Julian Dates. Features multiple scaling modes and interactive navigation.

projects.title: Risk Finance Management (NatWest)
projects.description: A secure user gateway for administrators to manage access permissions effectively. Features intuitive dashboards for modifying user access rights and viewing user information, enhancing operational security and efficiency.

projects.title: Elevance Healthcare Management
projects.description: A SaaS solution for healthcare clients featuring a mass update module for contract records. Streamlines operational workflows for users and clients by enabling efficient bulk data management.

testimonials.comments: Ranjith serves as a senior developer and technical lead for the WPD/CMA MUT Modernization program.
